name: Emperors Domination
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManga
content: Ten million years ago, Li Qiye planted a simple water bamboo into the ground.Eight million years ago, Li Qiye had a koi fish pet.Five million years ago, Li Qiye cared for a little girl….In the present day, Li Qiye woke up from his slumber the water bamboo reached the apex of cultivation the koi fish became a Golden Dragon the little girl became the Nine Worlds’ Immortal Empress. This is a tale regarding an immortal human who was the teacher of the Demon Saint, Heavenly Beast, and Immortal Empres
